title: Send Prompt to the LLM ‚Äî send_prompt
text: chat_id ID chat session. prompt prompt send. role role entity sending prompt, one "user" "tool_runner". mode mode operation, one "agent" "ask". model ID model use. project_context context session executing addin, obtained `get_project_context()`. api_url API URL use requests. api_key API key MyOwnRobs, obtained `get_api_key()`.
